38 class DJLSCodecParameter;
39 class DJLSLosslessEncoder;
40 class DJLSNearLosslessEncoder;
41 
44 class DJLSEncoderRegistration
45 {
46 public:
47 
64  static void registerCodecs(
65  OFBool jpls_optionsEnabled = OFFalse,
66  Uint16 jpls_t1 = 3,
67  Uint16 jpls_t2 = 7,
68  Uint16 jpls_t3 = 21,
69  Uint16 jpls_reset = 64,
70  Uint16 jpls_limit = 0,
71  OFBool preferCookedEncoding = OFTrue,
72  Uint32 fragmentSize = 0,
73  OFBool createOffsetTable = OFTrue,
74  JLS_UIDCreation uidCreation = EJLSUC_default,
75  OFBool convertToSC = OFFalse,
76  DJLSCodecParameter::interleaveMode jplsInterleaveMode = DJLSCodecParameter::interleaveDefault);
77 
83  static void cleanup();
84 
85 private:
86 
88  static OFBool registered_;
89 
91  static DJLSCodecParameter *cp_;
92 
94  static DJLSLosslessEncoder *losslessencoder_;
95 
97  static DJLSNearLosslessEncoder *nearlosslessencoder_;
98 
99 };
